#summary This wiki describe the KEGG Pathway dataset on the Desktop Tool

= KEGG Pathway =

The figure shows [SearchTab Search Tab] using the KEGG Pathway as main dataset. Any of the KEGG data type can be selected to perform a search. 

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/41.jpg

A search over the KEGG Pathway data type is:

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/42.jpg

In this dataset the quick search will be performed over the *Id* (ec00601), *Number* (00601) and *Title* fields including the use of [http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/pattern-matching.html SQL regular expressions].

On this !DataSet you are able to use other biological objects as [Constrains Constrains]. The available !DataSet to be used as constrains are: Taxonomy, KEGG Compound, KEGG Enzymes, KEGG Genes and KEGG Reactions.

The [SearchTab Search Tab] will produce a new [ListTab List Tab], next figure, with the obtained results.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/43.jpg

The KEGG Pathway complete description window

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/44.jpg
